name: Windows PowerShell Indent File
summary: Simple indenting rules for Windows PowerShell
description: Sets up a customized version of cindent for use with PowerShell. Best used with the Windows PowerShell syntax and ftplugin files (vimscript #1327 and vimscript #1816)
install_details: Copy this file into your indent folder (either $home\vimfiles\indent or $ProgramFiles\vim\vimfiles\indent).
